dc:title: Day After Day - February 1941
dc:creator: Dorothy Day
dc:description: Describes her busy speaking schedule and laments that there's so much to do. Advises sowing time to reap time. Attends meetings in Baltimore and a dinner with Sigrid Undset.
dc:identifier: Dorothy Day Library on the Web document 371 1941-02-01 James Allaire Creative Commons Non-Commercial Share Alike 3.0 en-US http://www.catholicworker.org/dorothyday
